cable.title: Ethernet
cable.no_wan: No cable detected in WAN port. Please insert an ethernet cable.
cable.rm_wan_cable: Please remove the ethernet cable from the WAN port.
cable.wan_been_lan: WAN port has been used as LAN. You can set it back to WAN below
cable.confirm_to_lan: Are you sure you want to use the WAN port as LAN?
cable.confirm_to_wan: Are you sure you want to change WAN port back to WAN?
cable.repeated: Connected successfully without having to reconnect
cable.dhcp_tips: IP address assigned by higher network machine.
cable.pppoe_vlanid_tips: This settings entry is only required if the provider's PPPoE server requires the interface to use a tagged specific VLAN ID.
cable.egderouter_mode_tips: Drop-in gateway is enabled. If you want to modify the Ethernet settings, please disable $$$$Drop-in Gateway$$$$ first.

tethering.title: Tethering
tethering.no_device_tips: No Tethering device found, Plug in your smartphone or USB Modem to start.

repeater.title: Repeater
repeater.allow_change: Allow Switching to Other Saved Networks
repeater.allow_change_tips: If the option is enabled, the router will automatically connect to other saved networks when it is unable to connect to the current Wi-Fi network.
repeater.antijam_tips: If this option is enabled, the device will improve the stability of the connection at the expense of reducing the connection rate.
repeater.lock_band_tips: If you manually select a band, the router will not scan or connect to any Wi-Fi with another band.
repeater.antijam_tips_2: It only works when repeating 2.4G Wi-Fi.
repeater.lock_bssid_tips: If this option is enabled, the router will only connect to the AP corresponding to the BSSID you selected when switching to a network using this SSID.
repeater.allow_dfs_tips1: If the option is enabled, when the router repeat Wi-Fi on any DFS channel, it will follow the hotspot for DFS channel avoidance. When this Wi-Fi is available, the router's own 5GHz Wi-Fi will use the DFS channel. Otherwise, the router's own 5GHz Wi-Fi will switch back to the non-DFS channel.
repeater.allow_dfs_tips2: Otherwise, the router will not connect to any Wi-Fi using DFS channels.
repeater.retry_disable_guest_tips: While attempting to reconnect, your router will periodically scan for Wi-Fi networks, and your guest Wi-Fi network will be temporarily unavailable during the scan.
repeater.scan_disable_guest_tips: During the scan for Wi-Fi signals, your guest network will be temporarily unavailable for about 10 seconds. Do you wish to continue?
repeater.fail_not_found_tips: Could not find the network, please check the SSID and security type you entered.
repeater.unusable_eap_tips: This router don't support repeat networks that use EAP.
repeater.fail_mac_tips: The MAC of the router can't be the same as any Wi-Fi client, please $$$$modify the MAC of the clone$$$$ or modify the MAC on that client.

modem.title: Cellular
modem.plug_in_tips: No Modem device found. Plug in your USB modem to start.
modem.name: Modem Name
modem.install_sim_tips: Please insert your SIM card into the SIM slot, then
modem.port_tips: The cdc-wcdm0 port is faster, and the ttyUSBX port has better compatibility.
modem.apn_tips: Some SIM cards require a specific APN. If you don't know the correct APN, please ask your network operator .
modem.ttl_tips: Some network operators will determine whether the SIM card is used on the router by detecting the value of TTL. If your SIM card can't be used on the router, you can try to set the TTL to a value other than 64 and 128 (for example, 65).
modem.sim_lock: SIM card has been locked, please input the PIN code to unlock it.
modem.traffic_tips: The results of traffic statistics are for reference only, and the actual traffic is subject to the amount of the bill provided by your network operator.
modem.clear_traffic: Disable Auto Saving of Traffic Statistics
modem.clear_traffic_tips: If the option is enabled, system will not automatically save traffic statistics.
modem.no_sim_tips: Your SIM card is not detected. Please check whether the card is inserted in the correct direction and the contact is good. The Modem doesn't support hot-swappable SIM card. If you re-insert the SIM card after boot, please $$$$Reboot Modem$$$$ or reboot your router.
modem.connecting_tips: Some SIM cards may have special usage restrictions, such as the need to use a specific APN. If your SIM card can't be registered, please consult your network operator if it has special restrictions.
modem.sim_no_profile_warning: 未选择配置文件，将使用自动配置。
modem.sim_failover_interval_tips: 故障转移失败后需要间隔一段时间才会重新切换。
modem.timing_check_main_sim_tips: 开启后，将会在指定时间切换回首选卡进行网络检测

sms.title: SMS
sms.not_found_sms_modem: This modem does not support SMS
sms.send_error_msg5: The device doesn't support SMS Feature.
sms.send_error_msg6: The current network environment doesn't support SMS Feature.
sms.forward_email_tips: If you want to forward SMS to email, please set the sender email first, it is used to send SMS to the target email. $$$$Learn More$$$$
sms.forward_email_subject_tips: You can customize the subject so that you can distinguish which phone number the SMS was received from.
sms.forward_phone_tips: If you want the router to forward SMS to your cell phone, make sure your mobile network is available and supports sending SMS.
